HOME_SECTION.LEARN_MORE: Want to learn more about my path in technology and software? Feel free to explore!

ABOUT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: I’m currently pursuing an MSc in Computer Engineering, following a bachelor’s degree in Management Engineering from Politecnico di Torino. My passion lies in the dynamic intersection of technology and management, with a particular focus on software development and innovation. As I work on my final thesis, I’m eager to embrace the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead, and I look forward to beginning my professional journey in the tech industry.

EDUCATION_SECTION.BACHELOR_INFO: I attended the bachelor’s degree in Management Engineering (L-8, Information Engineering) at Politecnico di Torino.
EDUCATION_SECTION.MASTER_INFO: I’m currently pursuing the master’s degree in Computer Engineering (Software orientation) at Politecnico di Torino.

CONTACT_SECTION.REACH_ME: You can reach me with this form!
